ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ohh, I m in heaven.  I recently joined a small guild, and last night the leader informed me they had acquired the components necessary for a breastplate.
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
>
> Sorry, I forgot to post that. The color is a very attractive deep blue.

Ohh, I'm in heaven. I recently joined a small guild, and last night the
leader informed me they had acquired the components necessary for a
breastplate. I've been dying to find a new set of armor that doesn't make
me look like C-3PO with a hatchet, and it couldn't get much better than
blue ('cept maybe green, but the rangers already cornered that market, I'm
sure).

Athren Notechaser, little blue-boy to be
